As soon as the stasis pod the Crush opens, a bot comes out, stretches and 
yawns...

Bot1:" Man, man, man! They should really install some sort of entertainment 
in those things...*Sniff* I miss Commander Keen...and the Dopefish.."

The pod that Wrath opens reveals another bot, he slowly gets up and cricks 
his neck...Bot1 looks to Bot2..

Bot1:" Hey Cyberkeet look where we are! Somewhere different from 
Cybertron...I'm so hungry...Hehe! Little kitty drinking from a bowl of 
milk..."

Cyberkeet:" No duh Flagist... I think though you have a screw loose..."
